actions.name: Catalytic
actions.description: Effect: The user's SPD stat is increased by 50% and the user has +2 default SPD Stages in Smoggy Weather. The user is treated as having the Poison Type for the effects of Smoggy Weather.

system.description: Effect: The user's SPD stat is increased by 50% and the user has +2 default SPD Stages in Smoggy Weather. The user is treated as having the Poison Type for the effects of Smoggy Weather.
